body.name: ZESICA Women's Short Sleeve Crewneck Striped T Shirt 2024 Summer Ribbed Knit Slim Fit Casual Basic Tee Tops
features: Size Guide: S=US 4-6, M=US 8-10, L=US 12-14, XL=US 16-18. This womens summer tops is made of breathable and stretchy fabric, soft and skin friendly, looks textured. Tight fit, if you prefer a looser fit, please choose one size larger!

Update your casual edit with our comfy and easy striped shirts. The stretchy tee features a classic crewneck, short sleeves, ribbed knit texture, slim fit, length above the hips, striped pattern, trendy and casual.

Elevate your everyday style with this chic and versatile women shirts. With a flattering fit and trendy striped details, offer endless possibilities for mixing and matching with your favorite bottoms, you can pairing this with wide leg pants, jeans, skirt or shorts along with a sneakers, sandals, heels, or loafers for a casual, but trendy look!
Suitable for daily wear, casual, work, home, office, holidays, party, dating, yoga, outdoor. Perfect tops in spring, summer and fall.
Wash Instruction: Hand/Machine washable with cold water recommended, do not bleach, iron in low, hang or line to dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this brand of tops. Fit well and great fabric.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice blouse true to size for a slim person
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ★★★★☆ (4/5)ZESICA Women's Short Sleeve Crewneck Striped T-Shirt: Stylish and Comfortable Summer EssentialThe ZESICA Women's Short Sleeve Crewneck Striped T-Shirt earns a commendable four-star rating for its stylish design, comfortable fabric, versatile pairing options, and suitability for various occasions. Here's a comprehensive review:SIZE GUIDE & FIT (★★★★☆):The size guide provided (S=US 4-6, M=US 8-10, L=US 12-14, XL=US 16-18) aids customers in selecting the right fit. My wife is slim and fit and looks perfect on her, so what I see is that it is true to size, for someone like her. If you are more voluptuous, this order one size up.The ribbed knit texture and slim fit provide a trendy and casual look. However, it's crucial to note that the top offers a tight fit, and those preferring a looser fit should choose one size larger. This earns a four-star rating.COMFORTABLE FABRIC (★★★★☆):Constructed from breathable and stretchy fabric, this short-sleeve tee is soft and skin-friendly. The textured appearance adds to its visual appeal. The fabric's comfort level receives positive feedback, contributing to a four-star rating.STYLISH DESIGN (★★★★☆):The tee features a classic crewneck, short sleeves, and a striped pattern, providing a chic and trendy appearance. The ribbed knit texture adds a touch of sophistication. The overall design is fashionable and suitable for casual wear, earning a four-star rating.VERSATILE PAIRING OPTIONS (★★★★☆):This women's striped T-shirt offers versatile pairing options, making it suitable for various occasions. Whether paired with wide-leg pants, jeans, skirts, or shorts, along with sneakers, sandals, heels, or loafers, it can create a casual yet trendy look. The flexibility in mixing and matching with different bottoms and footwear contributes to a four-star rating.SUITABILITY FOR OCCASIONS (★★★★☆):The T-shirt is suitable for daily wear, casual outings, work, home, office, holidays, parties, dating, yoga, and outdoor activities. Its adaptability across different settings in spring, summer, and fall enhances its overall appeal, earning a four-star rating.WASH INSTRUCTIONS (★★★★★):Clear and practical wash instructions are provided, recommending hand/machine wash with cold water, avoiding bleach, ironing on low, and hanging or lining to dry. This attention to care instructions ensures the longevity of the T-shirt and merits a five-star rating.OVERALL VERDICT (★★★★☆):The ZESICA Women's Short Sleeve Crewneck Striped T-Shirt stands out as a stylish and comfortable summer essential. While the size guide and fit cater to various body types, the comfortable fabric and stylish design make it an appealing choice. The tee's versatility in pairing options and suitability for different occasions contribute to its positive reception. The clear wash instructions add to the product's durability. While the overall rating is a commendable four stars, customers should be mindful of the tight fit and consider choosing a size larger for a looser style. Overall, the ZESICA Women's Short Sleeve Crewneck Striped T-Shirt offers a fashionable and comfortable addition to summer wardrobes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shirt is really striking. It fits as it should have based on the size measurements. The material is very thick and soft. The ribbing makes it extra comfortable and also stretches to accommodate various sizes. I like that the short sleeve on this is a little bit longer than a normal short sleeve. I think that it makes it look a little bit more classy. This is a great basic to wear under but would also look nice on its own. It could be dressed up or down. This is a great top!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality knit shirt
reviews.reviewText: I really like this shirt, it has instantly become one of my favorites. The listing says to size up one if you want a looser fit and I did that, and I wish that I just went with my usual size. WIth the shirt being stretchy and knit already, it is designed to fit to you tightly and if you size up too much the fabric sits on you funny. Just stay true to your usual size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt for office or home.
reviews.reviewText: I own multiple items from the Zesica brand, and have yet to be disappointed. This shirt is great. Looks just like the photo, is comfortable, can be dressed up for work or worn casually. In this style of shirt I always size up one. I’m normally a small, I size up to a medium. I’m a 32DDDD, and find the medium accommodates my chest without accentuating it too much. The color is beautiful, a nice steel blue. Highly recommend this top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering knit top
reviews.reviewText: The fabric is soft and stretchy. The fit is excellent and it is comfortable. I recommend to size up if you don’t want something super clingy.
